name: Abu Ghost
relationToIsrael: Planned multiple rocket attacks on Israeli border towns.

name: Layla Night
relationToIsrael: Involved in logistics for attacks in the past, currently under observation.

name: Red Falcon
relationToIsrael: Responsible for major coordinated attacks on Israeli infrastructure.

name: Silent Wave
relationToIsrael: Turned and currently provides intelligence to Israel.

name: Old Lion
relationToIsrael: Former leader, neutralized in an IDF operation.

name: Desert Fox
relationToIsrael: Participated in small arms smuggling; inactive recently.
